string.value: While studying the book, Athena remarked that she's heard about the Bowman's Ultimate Skill but has never seen one of these books before. She told me that if one masters this skill, they might even surpass her in level. To discover more, she told me to go see #bRene#k...\n\n#t4161025# #b#c4161025# / 1#k for more information. This is shaping up to be quite a journey...
I traveled to the frozen fields of El Nath and gave the book to Rene. She was intrigued by the book as well, and wants to study it a bit more before she tells me more information.

I heard about #bThe Bowman's Ultimate Skill#k and this legendary #btraining place#k long time ago. This is my first time to read a book with such information. Amazing... The book really exists! "The Bowman's Ultimate Skill" might not be just a legend after all...
I won't ask you where you get it from. But you have this book, so that means you are meant to be the #bNew Master of the Skill#k.

I don't remember much about the training place or how to perform the skill. I suggest that you see the senior #p2020010##k of #b#m211000000##k. She is one of the best Bowman in the Maple World. She may have more information for you. Maybe it'll come back to me at some point...
I hope you get this skill. If you can become the Ultimate Bowman, your skills may even exceed that of #b#p1012100##k. I'm looking forward to your progress!
Interesting...I thought you wanted attain the highest skill level a Bowman can hope for. I suppose I was mistaken...
Seeing that you come to see #p2020010#, you are definitely a Bowman. What can I do for you?
I've never seen this this. Let me have a look.
You haven't met #p2020010# yet. Is there anything else that I can help you with? If not, please get some advice from #b#p2020010##k first.
You look like a strong Bowman. What brought you here?
You lost the book? Fortunately, somebody brought it back. Be more careful.
